name: Amazon Business American Express Card

rewards.description: 3% back or 60-day terms at Amazon Business, AWS, and Whole Foods Market.
1% back on all other eligible purchases.

sign_up_bonus.description: Get a $100 Amazon Gift Card upon approval.

credits_and_benefits: Option for 60-day payment terms instead of rewards
Employee cards for no additional cost
eligibility: Business card; approval also gives immediate $100 gift card credit.

name: Amazon Business Prime American Express Card

rewards.description: 5% back or 90-day terms at Amazon Business, AWS, Amazon.com, and Whole Foods Market (Business Prime required).

sign_up_bonus.description: Receive a $125 Amazon Gift Card upon approval.

credits_and_benefits: Option for 90-day payment terms instead of rewards
eligibility: Business Prime membership required; Amex approval yields instant cashback reward.

name: American Express Blue Business® Plus Credit Card
intro_apr: 0% intro APR on purchases for 12 months

rewards.description: 2X Membership Rewards points on everyday business purchases up to $50,000 per calendar year.

eligibility: Business card; Amex lifetime rule applies.

name: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

rewards.description: 3% cash back on up to $6,000 of purchases per year in this category, then 1%.
3% cash back on up to $6,000 of purchases per year in this category, then 1%.
3% cash back on up to $6,000 of purchases per year in this category, then 1%.
1% cash back on all other eligible purchases.

eligibility: Standard AMEX credit card eligibility; no annual fee product.

name: Blue Cash Preferred® Card from American Express
intro_apr: 0% for 12 months on purchases and balance transfers

rewards.description: 6% cash back on up to $6,000 of purchases per year, then 1% back.
6% cash back on eligible streaming subscriptions.
1% cash back on all other eligible purchases.

sign_up_bonus.description: Earn $250 statement credit after $3,000 in purchases in your first 6 months.

eligibility: Standard AMEX credit card eligibility; cash back product.

name: American Express® Business Gold Card

rewards.description: 4X points on the top 2 spending categories each billing cycle (selected from eligible business categories).
1X point per dollar on all other eligible purchases.

sign_up_bonus.description: Earn 70,000 Membership Rewards points after $10,000 in purchases in the first 3 months.

eligibility: Business card; Amex lifetime rule applies.

name: American Express® Business Green Rewards Card
ongoing_apr: Pay Over Time APR varies, typically ~20%–28%

rewards.description: 2X points on travel booked through American Express Travel.
1X point on all other eligible purchases.

sign_up_bonus.description: Earn 15,000 Membership Rewards points after $3,000 in purchases in 3 months.

eligibility: Business card; Amex lifetime rule applies for the welcome offer.

name: The Business Platinum Card® from American Express

rewards.description: 5X points on flights and prepaid hotels booked through Amex Travel.
1.5X points on eligible purchases in key business categories (over $5k purchases and specific categories designated by Amex).
1X point per dollar on all other eligible purchases.

sign_up_bonus.description: Earn 120,000 Membership Rewards points after $15,000 in purchases in the first 3 months.

credits_and_benefits: Airport lounge access: Centurion, Priority Pass, Delta Sky Club
eligibility: Business card; Amex once-per-lifetime rule applies.

name: American Express® Gold Card
ongoing_apr: Pay Over Time APR varies, typically ~20%–28%

rewards.description: 4X points at restaurants worldwide, including takeout and delivery.
4X points at U.S. supermarkets on up to $25,000 per year, then 1X.
3X points on flights booked directly with airlines or via Amex Travel.
1X points on all other eligible purchases.

sign_up_bonus.description: Earn 60,000 Membership Rewards points after $6,000 spend in the first 6 months.

eligibility: Once-per-lifetime welcome offer rules apply.

name: American Express® Green Card

rewards.description: 3X points on travel including flights, hotels, transit, taxis, trains, and more.
3X points on transit: rideshare, buses, tolls, etc.

sign_up_bonus.description: Earn 40,000 Membership Rewards points after $3,000 spend in 6 months.

eligibility: Once-per-lifetime welcome offer rule applies.

name: The Platinum Card® from American Express
ongoing_apr: See Pay Over Time APR: variable, typically 20%–28%

rewards.description: 5X points on flights booked directly with airlines or through American Express Travel, on up to $500,000 per calendar year.
5X points on prepaid hotels booked through Amex Travel.
1X point per dollar on all other eligible purchases.

sign_up_bonus.description: Earn 80,000 Membership Rewards® points after spending $8,000 on purchases in the first 6 months.

credits_and_benefits: $200 Hotel Credit (Fine Hotels + Resorts / The Hotel Collection)
eligibility: Welcome offer not available to applicants who have had this product before (Amex once-per-lifetime rule).

name: The Plum Card® from American Express
ongoing_apr: N/A – Pay-in-full or pay over time (charge card terms)

rewards.description: 1.5% discount when you pay your balance early (within 10 days of statement closing).
Take up to 60 days to pay with no interest when minimum payment requirements are met.

credits_and_benefits: Flexible spending limit (no preset spending limit)
Up to 60 days to pay with no interest
Employee cards at no additional cost
eligibility: Business card with charge card terms; early pay discount rules apply.
